text: I didn't even know Alexander Brandon co-composed for this game until yesterday. As a big fan of his and the Puzzle Quest series, it makes me want to play this game someday. I generally find tile-matching puzzle games super addicting and the Bejeweled series is by far the most popular. That flute at 0:13 is classic Brandon.
author: SupraDarky
